sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_0586_til_post"> <x_0586_til_post action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <category display_value="Tricks">a8c6c0be1b8154908ed631d7dc4bcbef</category> <github_id>96</github_id> <github_url>https://github.com/iamkalai/SNTIL/issues/96</github_url> <message>If you ever want to get the label from a choice value or the choice value from a choice label, you could use ChoiceList script. The script is accessible only in global scope. ```javascript var script = new global.ChoiceList('task', 'state'); gs.info(script.getLabel('3')); //get choice label gs.info(script.getValue('Open')); //get choice value ```</message> <number>TIL0001099</number> <status>old</status> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-04-18 07:16:09</sys_created_on> <sys_id>cfb924ff2f32451051dad5f62799b6eb</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-04-19 15:22:55</sys_updated_on> <title>Get choice value from label and vice versa</title> </x_0586_til_post> </record_update>
